headline: Is Kraft Heinz Stock in Trouble?
summary: Kraft Heinz (NASDAQ: KHC) is a top food company in the world, but the business hasn't been doing well in recent years.  It has struggled to grow, and investors have been unloading the stock, with Kraft's share price falling by 18% over the past 12 months.  Here's a look at some of the key problems facing Kraft today and what the business needs to do to turn things around.
